owner.title: Owner
owner.description: Owns the bot and is the project leader for the Discord Ralsei Bot project.

developer.title: Developer
developer.description: An active developer for the Ralsei Bot.

formerdeveloper.title: Former Developer
formerdeveloper.description: A developer who formerly worked on the Ralsei Bot, but no longer actively develops it.

contributor.title: Contributor
contributor.description: A major contributor to the Ralsei Bot, its commands, features, or functionality.

bugfinder.title: Bugfinder
bugfinder.description: A user who found a bug with the Ralsei Bot and reported it to the development team.

vip.title: VIP
vip.description: Users who one or multiple developers find essential. VIPs have their own dedicated commands.

detective.title: Detective
detective.description: Found all secret commands that the bot has.

formerdetective.title: Former Detective
formerdetective.description: Previously found all secret commands that the bot then had, but has not found a newly added secret command.
